thread.title: Re: ‘You did this to yourself’! No, Chuck Todd, you don’t get to blame Trump for this
thread.title_full: Re: ‘You did this to yourself’! No, Chuck Todd, you don’t get to blame Trump for this

author: High School Drop Out
title: Re: ‘You did this to yourself’! No, Chuck Todd, you don’t get to blame Trump for this
text:
— Sean Davis (@seanmdav) February 16, 2017 
Viewers of any political stripe can probably agree on one thing: Trump’s press conference today was quite a … spectacle. And part of that spectacle included Trump once again dismissing and denigrating the MSM , much to many mainstream reporters’ chagrin. 
Chuck Todd, for one, is fa- REAKING the heck out: This not a laughing matter. I'm sorry, delegitimizing the press is unAmerican 
— Chuck Todd (@chucktodd) February 16, 2017 
With all due respect, Chuck, Donald Trump isn’t responsible for the press’ crumbling legitimacy. He didn’t build that; you guys made that happen. . @chucktodd a little self-reflection by you and your comrades would be in order here 
— Legal Insurrection (@LegInsurrection) February 16, 2017 @chucktodd you built it Chuck 
— resistance robert (@rowast) February 16, 2017 Then stop doing it. https://t.co/eUtTSN0qb1 
— Debbie Moss (@mosesmosesmoses) February 16, 2017 y'all do a very good job of it without trump's assistance tbh https://t.co/kAXf7L48FZ
